name: Hotel City Central

reviews.text: I am checking out of this hotel as I write. It has been an excellent stay: no fuss, no frills, supreme efficiency, cleanliness, courtesy, and economy (relatively speaking.)
reviews.title: Agreed! A great bargain.

description: The central location near the 1st District, coupled with the employees - typical Viennese charm, distinguish this 4-star hotel. Behind the stylish facade, guests find a perfect refuge for their stay in Vienna. 58 rooms and new, individual City Apartments in a nearby building are all convincing thanks to their classy furnishings and modern comforts such as air conditioning, cable and pay TV, and high-speed internet access.
